content: amadeus mitts i originally designed these mitts for my daughter s tiny hands and went on to size them for tiny smallish and larger using heavier weight yarn and larger needles the pattern is deceptively simple with lace encircling the wrist and back of the hand with stockinette on the palm it is written for magic loop but could easily be adapted for dpns please do not copy distribute or sell this pattern in any form grace anne knits 2025 to determine your size wrap a flexible measuring tape around your hand below the knuckles excluding your thumb sizes tiny 7 5 smallish 8 0 larger 8 5 materials tiny fingering yarn 150 - 200 yards us 2 2 75mm 32 circular needle smallish sport/dk yarn 150 200 yards us 4 3 5mm 32 circular needle larger worsted yarn 150 200 yards us 6 4 0mm 32 circular needle notions 1 locking stitch marker 1 additional marker waste yarn and tapestry needle to weave in ends abbreviations co - cast on using the backward loop method k - knit k1tbl - knit 1 through the back loop gracianne designs k2tog - knit 2 stitches together kfb - knit into the front and back of the stitch increase 1 stitch p - purl pm - place marker ssk - slip slip knit slipped stitches together sm - slip marker sts - stitches 1 twisted rib cuff cast on 48 sts using a stretchy cast on method and divide evenly onto needle 1 and needle 2 being careful not to twist prepare to join and work in the round place a unique stitch marker to indicate the beginning of the round k1tbl p1 for 10 rounds right mitt right wrist work rounds 1 - 24 of lace chart each chart row is worked once per needle right hand/thumb from this point forward the back of the hand needle 1 is worked from lace chart repeating row 1 24 the palm needle 2 is worked in stockinette with thumb shaping needle 1 needle 2 round 1 work chart row 1 kfb kfb pm k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 round 2-4 work chart row 2-4 k4 sm k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 round 5 work chart row 5 kfb k2 kfb sm k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 round 6-8 work chart row 6-8 k6 sm k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 round 9 work chart row 9 kfb k4 kfb sm k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 round 10-12 work chart row 10-12 k8 sm k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 round 13 work chart row 13 kfb k6 kfb sm k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 round 14-16 work chart row 14-16 k10 sm k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 round 17 work chart row 17 kfb k8 kfb sm k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1 round 18-19 work chart row 18-19 k12 sm k1tbl p1 k16 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p1
